title: Ep 50: Sustainable Style with Natalie Harris
itunes:title: Ep 50: Sustainable Style with Natalie Harris
itunes:subtitle: This week, Doree finally goes back to her Broadway Dance Class (sans nausea), and Kate gets some helpful advice from listeners about her back pain. Plus they discuss their winter clothing wants, secondhand shopping, and investing in garments that last....
description:
This week, Doree finally goes back to her Broadway Dance Class (sans nausea), and Kate gets some helpful advice from listeners about her back pain. Plus they discuss their winter clothing wants, secondhand shopping, and investing in garments that last.

Then they welcome Natalie Harris, founder and designer of the clothing line The Tiny Closet. She talks about how getting laid off led her to make her own clothes and eventually start her line, breaking up with fast fashion, curating her closet, and of course, self care. You can follow Natalie on Instagram at @TheTinyCloset.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Rothy’s - Use promo code forever35 for free shipping!
  • Care/of - 25% off your first month with promo code forever35 at checkout.
  • Away - For $20 off a suitcase visit awaytravel.com/forever35 and enter promo code forever35 at checkout.
  • Thrive Market - For 25% off your first order visit thrivemarket.com/forever35 for an automatic discount.
  • Simple Contacts - For $20 off your first order visit simplecontacts.com/forever or enter the code forever at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
